Lyrics: Alcun non può saper da chi sia amato,
Poetic Translation: A man can never know who truly loves him

Lyrics: quando felice in su la ruota siede;
Poetic Translation: When at the summit of the (Fortune's) Wheel he's seated;

Lyrics: però c'ha i veri amici e i sent'a lato
Direct Translation: See William Stewart Rose's translation at the Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: From both true friends and those (folk) who tire of him,

Lyrics: che mostran tutti una medesma fede.
Poetic Translation: With just the same devoted faith he's greeted.

Lyrics: Se poi si cangia in tristo il lieto stato,
Poetic Translation: But when down to the bottom (his) Fortune shoves him,

Lyrics: volta la turba adulatrice il piede;
Poetic Translation: Then he discovers fawning crowds retreated,

Lyrics: e quel che di cor ama riman forte,
Poetic Translation: While one whose heart in honest love is bonded

Lyrics: et ama il suo signor dopo la morte.
Poetic Translation: Will love his lord till death and then beyond it.
